subject: Re: Radioshack Coupons!
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
Just bought a 12-150 for 34.99. Heckuva deal, anyone thinking of using
one of these coupons, you can print them off at radioshack dot com. I
didn't have one but got them to give me the discount anyway. Might
print off one and pickup a spare 12-469. Thanks Aaron for the heads up :)



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "kolrone" <a.cronk@...> wrote:
>
> Good news for anyone looking to get new equipment. I went into
> Radioshack today and they handed me a coupon for 30% off Radioshack
> products and 10% off additional products. I bought the 20-125 for
> about $30. So that is a nice discount. I almost wanted to by other
> stuff but I decided to wait off on it. The coupons expire on 11/2 so
> try to get to your local Radioshack. I don't know if they are giving
> away the coupons everywhere, but I also got an email about the
> discounts, so there is a good chance they are. Good luck.
> 
> -Aaron
>
